entry.title: cypht-org/cypht
entry.summary:
Cypht: Lightweight Open Source webmail aggregator [PHP, JS]. Supports IMAP/SMTP, JMAP and EWS (Exchange Web Services)

Cypht

https://cypht.org

All your email, from all your accounts, in one place. Supports IMAP/SMTP, JMAP and EWS. Cypht is like a news reader, but for E-mail. Cypht does not replace your existing accounts - it combines them into one. And it's also a news reader.

.

The driving force behind Cypht development is to provide combined views for multiple accounts, but it's also a standard E-mail client that lets you browse and manage IMAP folders and send outbound messages with SMTP.

Cypht is an application built entirely of plugins, or as we call them, module sets (which is obviously way cooler sounding than plugins), that are executed by the framework. Modules provide a flexible way to add new features or customize the program without hacking the code.

Installation instructions

  • All Cypht latest and master versions: https://cypht.org/install

Monthly community meetings: https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/wiki/Monthly-Community-Meetings

Security details: https://cypht.org/security

Module info: https://cypht.org/modules

Features: https://cypht.org/features

License: https://cypht.org/license

Community chat room: https://gitter.im/cypht-org/community

For developers, get via Composer: https://packagist.org/packages/jason-munro/cypht

Docker: https://hub.docker.com/r/cypht/cypht

LinkedIn group: https://www.linkedin.com/groups/13804559/

An interview with the project's founder: https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/wiki/AMA-Jason-Munro

entry.title: mahdiMGF2/botmirzapanel
entry.summary:
VPN sales robot for marzban panel with professional capabilities

ü§ñ Bot Mirza Panel

A Powerful Bot for Selling VPN Services with Auto Configuration Build.

üìö Table of Contents

  • ‚ú® Overview
  • ‚öôÔ∏è Features
  • üöÄ Installation
    • Beta Installation
    • Updating the Bot
    • Removing the Bot
  • üì± Demo Bot
  • üíµ Financial Support

‚ú® Overview

Mirza Bot Panel is a feature-rich Telegram bot designed for selling VPN services for platforms like Marzban and 3x-ui panels. This bot simplifies the process of VPN subscription sales, enabling seamless automation, configuration building, and user management.

Mirza Panel comes in two versions:

  1. Free Version üÜì: Offers basic functionalities to get started with VPN sales.
  2. Subscription Version üíé: Provides advanced features for businesses looking for more customization, detailed analytics, and enhanced management options.

Whether you‚Äôre offering trial accounts or managing large-scale VPN services, this bot covers everything you need to run a successful VPN business.

‚öôÔ∏è Features

üîπ Free Version Features

  • ‚úÖ VPN Purchase with Auto Configuration Creation
  • ‚úÖ View Purchased Services
  • ‚úÖ Trial Accounts for Users
  • ‚úÖ User Support Section
  • ‚úÖ Verification via Phone Number
  • ‚úÖ Payments via:
    • Card-to-Card
    • NowPayments Gateway
    • aqayepardakht Gateway
  • ‚úÖ Fully Automated Configuration Creation
  • ‚úÖ Compatibility with All Protocols
  • ‚úÖ Mandatory Channel Membership for Purchases
  • ‚úÖ Detailed Purchase and Trial Account Reports
  • ‚úÖ Tutorial Section with Admin-Customizable Content
  • ‚úÖ Balance Management via Admin Panel
  • ‚úÖ Multiple Admin Support
  • ‚úÖ Manage Purchased Services:
    • Renewals
    • Additional Volume Purchases
    • Configuration Retrieval
    • Updating Service Links
  • ‚úÖ FAQ Section
  • ‚úÖ Text Customization from the Bot
  • ‚úÖ Product and Panel Management
  • ‚úÖ Admin-Specified Username Generation Methods
  • ‚úÖ Configuration Settings Based on Protocols
  • ‚úÖ Gateway Management

üîπ Subscription Version Features

In addition to the features of the Free Version, the Subscription Version includes:

  • üîê Admin Access Levels (Management, Sales, Support)
  • üßæ View and Manage All Users in the Bot
  • üéüÔ∏è Advanced Discount Code Management
  • ü§ù Reseller Support
  • üí∞ Refund and Service Removal Options
  • ‚ö° Advanced Panel-Specific Bandwidth Management
  • üîÑ Manage Panel Status
  • üîë Separate Panels for Test Accounts
  • ‚è≥ Set Service Purchase Durations
  • üì§ Send Configurations Directly After Payment
  • üîÑ Renewal and Volume Purchases (Even for Non-Existing Services)
  • üí≥ Inventory Control (Set Minimum and Maximum Inventory Increases)
  • üì© Support Messages with Admin Responses
  • üîó Advanced Subset Management
  • üõí Bulk Purchase Options
  • üÜî Multiple Username Creation Methods
  • üîç Quick Service Search
  • üìÖ Advanced Cron Job Settings
  • üìä Comprehensive Bot Statistics
  • ‚ùå Limit Configuration Creation per Panel
  • üñ•Ô∏è Web Panel Integration
  • üåç Change Location of Services
  • üîÑ Transfer Services Between Users
  • üí± Rial Exchange Payment Gateways

üìå Subscription Purchase Guide: View Guide

üöÄ Installation

Prerequisites

Ensure you have the following before installation:

  • üñ•Ô∏è Ubuntu Server 22
  • üåê A Domain Name

üîß Installing the Bot (Stable Version)

Run the following command in your server terminal:

curl -o install.sh -L https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mahdiMGF2/botmirzapanel/main/install.sh && bash install.sh

When prompted, select option 1 to complete the installation.

‚ö†Ô∏è Beta Installation

üí° Disclaimer: This is a beta release. It may contain bugs or issues. Use it with caution and report any problems you encounter.

To install the beta version, run:

curl -o install.sh -L https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mahdiMGF2/botmirzapanel/main/install.sh && bash install.sh -beta

üîÑ updating bot

To update your bot to the latest version, use the following command:

curl -o install.sh -L https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mahdiMGF2/botmirzapanel/main/install.sh && bash install.sh -update

‚ùå removing

If you want to completely remove the bot from your server, run the following command:

curl -o install.sh -L https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mahdiMGF2/botmirzapanel/main/install.sh && bash install.sh

When prompted, select option 3 to remove the bot.

üì± Demo Bot

Want to see Mirza Panel in action? Try the demo bot here:
üëâ Demo Bot

üíµ Financial Support

If you find Mirza Panel helpful and would like to support its development, you can make a financial contribution via cryptocurrency.

  • TRX Network (TRC20):
    TNvwhpNtXxKMFFeVzGR8GNZ6gL4aECituU

Your support ensures continued updates and improvements for this project. Thank you! üôå
